title: Dow set to fall and oil prices go into reverse
text:
New York (CNN Business) The Dow and US financial markets calmed down after Monday's oil price surge that sent shock waves around the world.

Oil prices came off Monday's highs on Tuesday, with US oil down 1.6% at $61.90 per barrel. Brent crude, the international benchmark, is also down 1.6% at $67.94 a barrel.

Dow INDU US stocks futures are mixed, withfutures pointing down 20 points.

If oil prices fail to capture investors' attention on Tuesday, focus may turn to the Federal Reserve, which is beginning its two-day monetary policy meeting that will culminate in its interest rate update on Wednesday.

Read More
description: The Dow and US financial markets calmed down after Monday's oil price surge that sent shock waves around the world.
